languages.text: "Деяния наши подобны гордому скакуну, шерин! Взгляни с одной стороны, и увидишь гордую стать, сильные мышцы, пылкий взгляд! Взгляни с другой — узришь задницу. Я предпочитаю видеть в сей победе триумф воителей Великого над теми, кого нелюди почитали лучшими мастерами своей кровавой пляски!"

"Our deeds are like a proud stallion, shereen! Look at it from one end and you see the proud bearing, the powerful muscles, and fire in its eyes! Look at it from the other end and all you see is a horse's arse. I prefer to view this victory as a triumph of the Exalted One's warriors over those revered by the inhumans as the finest masters of their bloody dance!"
languages.original_text: "Деяния наши подобны гордому скакуну, шерин! Взгляни с одной стороны, и увидишь гордую стать, сильные мышцы, пылкий взгляд! Взгляни с другой — узришь задницу. Я предпочитаю видеть в сей победе триумф воителей Великого над теми, кого нелюди почитали лучшими мастерами своей кровавой пляски!"

I prefer to view this victory as a triumph of the Exalted One's warriors over those revered by the inhumans as the finest masters of their bloody dance!"

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我们的所作所为就像一匹骄傲的骏马，亲爱的！从前面看，你会看到它高傲的姿态、强壮的肌肉与眼中的火焰！而从后面看，就只不过是马屁股而已。至高无上的神皇麾下的战士，战胜了异形公认的精英战士，将那些血腥之舞的大师踩在了脚下！我更愿意以这样的角度来看待这场胜利。”
languages.original_text: "Our deeds are like a proud stallion, shereen! Look at it from one end and you see the proud bearing, the powerful muscles, and fire in its eyes! Look at it from the other end and all you see is a horse's arse. I prefer to view this victory as a triumph of the Exalted One's warriors over those revered by the inhumans as the finest masters of their bloody dance!"

traits.locale_text: “我们的所作所为就像一匹骄傲的骏马，亲爱的！从前面看，你会看到它高傲的姿态、强壮的肌肉与眼中的火焰！而从后面看，就只不过是马屁股而已。至高无上的神皇麾下的战士，战胜了异形公认的精英战士，将那些血腥之舞的大师踩在了脚下！我更愿意以这样的角度来看待这场胜利。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「我々の行いは誇り高き雄馬のようなもの！一方から見れば、誇らしげな佇まい、力強い筋肉、目に宿る炎が見える！もう一方から見れば、馬の尻しか見えない。アタシは、この勝利を、血に塗れた舞踏の達人として人外の者たちがみなすものに対する、エグザルテッド・ワンの戦士の勝利としたいの！」
languages.original_text: "Our deeds are like a proud stallion, shereen! Look at it from one end and you see the proud bearing, the powerful muscles, and fire in its eyes! Look at it from the other end and all you see is a horse's arse. I prefer to view this victory as a triumph of the Exalted One's warriors over those revered by the inhumans as the finest masters of their bloody dance!"

traits.locale_text: 「我々の行いは誇り高き雄馬のようなもの！一方から見れば、誇らしげな佇まい、力強い筋肉、目に宿る炎が見える！もう一方から見れば、馬の尻しか見えない。アタシは、この勝利を、血に塗れた舞踏の達人として人外の者たちがみなすものに対する、エグザルテッド・ワンの戦士の勝利としたいの！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Nuestras hazañas son como un semental orgulloso, shereen! ¡Si lo mira desde un lado, ves porte regio, músculos poderosos y fuego en sus ojos! Si lo miras por otro lado, ves el culo de un caballo. ¡Y yo prefiero pensar en esta victoria como un triunfo de los guerreros del Exaltado contra aquellos a quienes los no humanos consideran los mayores maestros de su sangriento baile!».
languages.original_text: "Our deeds are like a proud stallion, shereen! Look at it from one end and you see the proud bearing, the powerful muscles, and fire in its eyes! Look at it from the other end and all you see is a horse's arse. I prefer to view this victory as a triumph of the Exalted One's warriors over those revered by the inhumans as the finest masters of their bloody dance!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Nuestras hazañas son como un semental orgulloso, shereen! ¡Si lo mira desde un lado, ves porte regio, músculos poderosos y fuego en sus ojos! Si lo miras por otro lado, ves el culo de un caballo. ¡Y yo prefiero pensar en esta victoria como un triunfo de los guerreros del Exaltado contra aquellos a quienes los no humanos consideran los mayores maestros de su sangriento baile!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Nos actions sont comme un fier étalon, shereen ! Observé d'un côté, on voit sa tête fièrement dressée, ses muscles puissants et la flamme dans son regard ! Mais tout ce qu'on voit quand on passe de l'autre côté, c'est sa croupe. Je préfère considérer cette victoire comme un triomphe des guerriers de l'Exalté contre ceux que les non-humains vénèrent comme les plus grands maîtres de leur danse sanglante ! »
languages.original_text: "Our deeds are like a proud stallion, shereen! Look at it from one end and you see the proud bearing, the powerful muscles, and fire in its eyes! Look at it from the other end and all you see is a horse's arse. I prefer to view this victory as a triumph of the Exalted One's warriors over those revered by the inhumans as the finest masters of their bloody dance!"

traits.locale_text: « Nos actions sont comme un fier étalon, shereen ! Observé d'un côté, on voit sa tête fièrement dressée, ses muscles puissants et la flamme dans son regard ! Mais tout ce qu'on voit quand on passe de l'autre côté, c'est sa croupe. Je préfère considérer cette victoire comme un triomphe des guerriers de l'Exalté contre ceux que les non humains vénèrent comme les plus grands maîtres de leur danse sanglante ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Unsere Taten entsprechen dem einen stolzen Hengsts, Shereen! Auf eine bestimmte Art betrachtet erkennt man ihre stolze Haltung, ihre kräftigen Muskeln und das Feuer in ihren Augen! Auf eine andere Art betrachtet wirken sie natürlich nur wie ein Pferdearsch. Ich ziehe es vor, unseren Sieg als einen Triumph der Krieger des Erhabenen zu betrachten – ein Sieg über diejenigen, die von den Nicht-Menschen als die größten Meister ihres blutigen Tanzes verehrt werden!"
languages.original_text: "Our deeds are like a proud stallion, shereen! Look at it from one end and you see the proud bearing, the powerful muscles, and fire in its eyes! Look at it from the other end and all you see is a horse's arse. I prefer to view this victory as a triumph of the Exalted One's warriors over those revered by the inhumans as the finest masters of their bloody dance!"

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Taten entsprechen dem einen stolzen Hengsts, Shereen! Auf eine bestimmte Art betrachtet erkennt man ihre stolze Haltung, ihre kräftigen Muskeln und das Feuer in ihren Augen! Auf eine andere Art betrachtet wirken sie natürlich nur wie ein Pferdearsch. Ich ziehe es vor, unseren Sieg als einen Triumph der Krieger des Erhabenen zu betrachten – ein Sieg über diejenigen, die von den Nicht-Menschen als die größten Meister ihres blutigen Tanzes verehrt werden!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Eylemlerimiz, gururlu bir aygır gibi şirinim! Bir taraftan baktığında gururlu duruşunu, güçlü kaslarını ve gözlerindeki ateşi görebilirsin! Diğer tarafından bakarsan tek göreceğin şeyse at götü ama. Ben bu zaferi; Görkemli'nin savaşçılarının, kanlı danslar üzerine uzmanlığıyla tanınan insan dışılara karşı galibiyeti şeklinde görmeyi tercih ediyorum!"
languages.original_text: "Our deeds are like a proud stallion, shereen! Look at it from one end and you see the proud bearing, the powerful muscles, and fire in its eyes! Look at it from the other end and all you see is a horse's arse. I prefer to view this victory as a triumph of the Exalted One's warriors over those revered by the inhumans as the finest masters of their bloody dance!"

traits.locale_text: "Eylemlerimiz, gururlu bir binek gibi şirinim! Bir taraftan baktığında gururlu duruşunu, güçlü kaslarını ve gözlerindeki ateşi görebilirsin! Diğer tarafından bakar isen tek göreceğin şey at götü ama. Ben bu zaferi Görkemli'nin savaşçılarının, kanlı danslar konusundaki uzmanlığıyla tanınan insan dışılara karşı galip gelmesi şeklinde görmeyi tercih ediyorum!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
